data.name: Tails From Alteria Demo
data.detailed_description: This demo is the prologue chapter of TFA and it takes place 20 years before the main game! You won't be playing as Jeeve & Jayla, but actually their parents; Jeeve Sr. and Stella Javari! Take control of this mercenary fox couple as they touch down and investigate some strange happenings at a secret research facility. Utilize quick thinking and swift action commands as you come up against tough foes. It's survival of the flattest!
data.about_the_game: This demo is the prologue chapter of TFA and it takes place 20 years before the main game! You won't be playing as Jeeve & Jayla, but actually their parents; Jeeve Sr. and Stella Javari! Take control of this mercenary fox couple as they touch down and investigate some strange happenings at a secret research facility. Utilize quick thinking and swift action commands as you come up against tough foes. It's survival of the flattest!
data.short_description: A wacky RPG about family, adventure, and cute foxes! Follow the misadventures of twin foxes Jeeve and Jayla Javari, as they race against unseen forces and try to stop the world from ending.
